issue.title: jin115.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).


## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166924) if other issue.

issue.title: m.inven.co.kr

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

issue.title: m.ygosu.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

labels.name: List-KR
labels.description: Problematic issues, handled in List-KR

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

labels.name: A: Problematic

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).


## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166924) if other issue.

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
Adding aircanada.com to HTTPS exception list without disabling all other modules works to solve the problem.
Unsure why it blocks aircanada to begin with though.

comment.body:
Hm, that's strange. Please remove the rules above, disable all modules leaving only global protection and HTTPS filtration, then add `aircanada.com` to HTTPS exception list manually (settings - network - exceptions - press on plus button - enter the domain there).
After that clear browser data, restart it, reproduce the problem.
To be honest, in that case it's best to file an issue [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/CoreLibs/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-desc).

comment.body:
> So, that's not related to filters. Good to know.
> 
> > Is this a permanent solution? What protections am I losing by doing this?
> 
> Actually, not. Please check the site with one of this exceptions. Note that the filters with other modules should be disabled except the user rules.
> 
> ```
> @@||aircanada.com^$elemhide,jsinject,extension,content
> @@||aircanada.com^$xmlhttprequest,elemhide,jsinject,extension
> ```

Thanks.
Adding these two to the User Rules and disabling other filters did not work. 

Appreciate your time in trying to solve this.

comment.body:
So, that's not related to filters. Good to know.

> Is this a permanent solution? What protections am I losing by doing this?

Actually, not. Please check the site with one of this exceptions. Note that the filters with other modules should be disabled except the user rules.
```adblock
@@||aircanada.com^$elemhide,jsinject,extension,content
@@||aircanada.com^$xmlhttprequest,elemhide,jsinject,extension
```

Disabling filters did not solve the issue.

What did solve it was going into "Network > Automatically filter applications > Disabling Safari". 

Is this a permanent solution? What protections am I losing by doing this?

comment.body:
Before that, please file the issue in the [CoreLibs repo](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/CoreLibs/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-desc) with logs. To collect the logs, please do this: 1. Remove the `aircanada.com` from the HTTPS exception list 2. Disable all modules leaving only the global protection 3. Change the logging level to debug mode. You can find the setting in the screenshot below
Screenshot: ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/97e73c71-2107-48db-8226-4b8c2b4a9d2f)

4. Reproduce the problem 5. Export logs (you can also find them on the screenshot) 6. Send them to support@adguard.com with a description of the problem 7. You will get a ticket number 8. File an issue in the [CoreLibs repo](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/CoreLibs/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-desc). Please write it with steps to reproduce in detail. Also mention that the issue appears with only global protection enabled without other modules 9. Also specify that you have the debug logs by sending the support ticket number. After that you can restore your configuration. Also add the domain to HTTPS exclusion list. Thank you for your participation.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

issue.title: Review this list of missed spywares
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Visual Studio Code Marketplace (marketplace.visualstudio.com)

||marketplace.visualstudio.com/_apis/*/stats (page events)
||marketplace.visualstudio.com/_apis/ClientTrace/ (error reporting)
||marketplace.visualstudio.com/_apis/customerintelligence/ (analytics)

---

nextjs and vercel cookie consent can be more efficiently blocked by prevent loading of this file (only apply to EU as mentioned):

/fides.js$domain=nextjs.org|vercel.com

spyware:
||nextjs.org/api/ai/ping
||nextjs.org/api/stream/internal
||vercel.com/api/stream/internal

---

figma annoyance: cookie notice and indismissable sign in prompt.

figma.com##[class^="base_cookie_banner"]
figma.com##[class^="footer_banner--googleBanner"]

---

statsig spyware (very privacy invasive, also added in hagezi dns):

||prodregistryv2.org^

---

flowgpt.com spyware. very privacy invasive and makes hundreds of requests per minute.

||data-ingestion.flowgpt.com^
||flowgpt.com/marketing/ (not tracking, but prevents loading of heavy resources that doesn't affect user)
||flowgpt.com/mp/track
||tianji.flowgpt.com^

---

relatively new. collects timestamp/trace. so not blocked anywhere else.

||awswaf.com/*/telemetry

this affects all website that uses AWS WAF to protect themselves (this is similar to cloudflare's turnstile). for example you can try signing up to huggingface.co (reputable ML platform) with a vpn or something and inspect network requests.

---

Hetzner first party matomo analytics.

||use.hetzner.com^

---

Teachable.com (and any platform that uses teachable) collects data via:

||eventable.internal.teachable.com^

tested for 2 months with no breakage.

All the reports are manually inspected from EU region.


### Proposed solution

Add these rules to AdGuard filters

### Additional information

_No response_

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).


## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166924) if other issue.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
I already had @@||google.adservices.com^$important in the custom filters (added by the Query Log when I clicked 'Unblock') and I also added a few more that were showing in the logs, just in case:

```
@@||googleadservices.com^$important
@@||googleads.g.doubleclick.net^$important
@@||aax-eu.amazon-adsystem.com^$important
@@||static.doubleclick.net^$important
```

but I did not include the www prefix. I did that now and it has made no difference with or without the "$important" suffix. Once I've applied the rules, how long does it take to take effect? Immediate?

I realise this request is a bit odd, trying to show ads in an adblocker, but these are really search results that happen to be product ads, and I use them all the time (as millions of others do, so I'm surprised others have not already nailed this).

Any other ideas?

comment.body:
**Update:**

Just re-read this thread and saw the query regarding 'upb-notification-bar'.  I had no idea what this was but unchecked my browser extensions to no avail. But on the Amazon sites I do have a **link creator bar** (I'm an Amazon Influencer, so can get links with/without images to paste into my YT videos). 

Frankly, I don't see how an Amazon page toolbar could affect **all** other product pages (not all products are sold by Amazon) unless AZ somehow adds/injects the bar to all product pages I browse... sounds unlikely but as it's controlled by my AZ account, I guess it's possible.

It's suddenly all started working but whether the above was the reason or because AdGuardHome has just re-read the custom filters, I do not know. I shall leave it for 24 hours before fiddling / actioning any more changes to the Customs Filter page.

comment.body:
> @jimmysofat6864
> 
> > Amazon browsing history for recent items doesn't work when adguard is enabled
> 
> Please test in user filter:
> 
> ```
> ||amazon.com/1/batch/1/OP/$badfilter
> ||amazon.com/1/batch/1/OE/$badfilter
> ```

Yep adding those two rules fixed it for me.
